title: Unsecured FTP and SSH Challenge
description: Explore an FTP server with misconfigured SSH access to uncover sensitive data.
hints: Check for writable directories on the FTP server.
Look for weak credentials that might be reused for SSH.
Consider what the SSH access might allow you to do with FTP data.
learningObjectives: Understand the risks of FTP and SSH misconfigurations
Practice pivoting from one service to another
